testsuite.name: Scenario: creation fails when password and password confirmation do not match

testcase.name: Given command new user is selected
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails when password and password confirmation do not match

testcase.name: When username "liisa" and password "salainen1" and confirmation password "salainen2" are entered
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails when password and password confirmation do not match

testcase.name: Then user is not created and error "password and password confirmation do not match" is reported
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails when password and password confirmation do not match
